synopsis.text: When portals to parallel worlds suddenly appear, Earth becomes the battleground for beings from five warring dimensions. As mankind struggles to coexist with these interdimensional invaders, known as Zex, a fragile peace treaty is established. For Azumi Kakamigahara, a young woman afflicted by a mysterious illness, her only hope for survival lies in forming a pact with a Zex named Rigel. Together, they join the newly founded Fujimisaki Academy, where young women and their Zex partners are secretly trained to defend against the next wave of hostile attackers. Little do they know, their destinies are about to unfold as they face the imminent threat to their idyllic world. Based on the card game of the same name, Z/X: Code Reunion follows Azumi and Rigel as they navigate this perilous journey.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
